description:
codereview: support mercurial 2.2.1
        We explicitly use plainformatter to avoid the
        user's debug setting changing our behavior.
        Fixes issue 3603.

messages.text:
On Fri, May 11, 2012 at 2:41 AM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Does this work with older mercurials too?
>
Yes, only newer mercurial calls ui.formatter(), and if it's called, it
should be safe to
import mercurial.formatter. If older mercurials call ui.formatter, this
issue would be
raised earlier :-)

I've tested this CL on hg 2.0.1.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/
Does this work with older mercurials too?

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e3f21b7c5955 ***

codereview: support mercurial 2.2.1
        We explicitly use plainformatter to avoid the
        user's debug setting changing our behavior.
        Fixes issue 3603.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6201069

subject: code review 6201069: codereview: support mercurial 2.2.1
